ComicInfo.Title: Dawn Patrol; Special Missions Part Five: Scarlett
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dawn Patrol: Dawn is sent on a training mission in Louisiana but she outsmarts her mentors and escapes the confines of the remote locale.
Special Missions Part Five: Scarlett: Scarlett recalls how Snake Eyes was disfigured while saving her life. She tells Sean how she obtained a special mask for Snake Eyes to help conceal his scars, then presents a new mask for Sean to wear.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 10:31:13. [CVDB682439] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:35:09. [Issue ID 1850150]

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dylan Teague,Harvey Tolibao,Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),John Royale,Kevin Tolibao,Larry Hama,Natali Sanders,S.L. Gallant
